sensortype: 1/2.3-inch CMOS Image Sensor with primary color filter
focallength: f=5.0 – 25.0mm, equivalent to 28 – 140mm on a 35mm camera
focusrange: 60 cm to infinity / 2.0 ft to infinity (Wide), 1.0 m to infinity / 3.3 ft ot infinity (Telephoto)
shutterspeed: 1/4 sec. to 1/2000 sec.(Auto), 4 sec. to 1/2000 sec.(All other modes)
